thread.title: Joel Embiid Expertly Slayed Skip Bayless For His Bad Cowboys Take

author: mrothstein914
title: Joel Embiid Expertly Slayed Skip Bayless For His Bad Cowboys Take
text:
Getty Image
Skip Bayless is a professional troll who spent a lot of the formative years in his career in Dallas, so of course heâ€™s a Cowboys fan. Thatâ€™s a position that lends him to many smug proclamations that can blow up hilariously in his face. Naturally, he made a spectacularly short-sighted boast as the Cowboys tied up their game against the Packers with 35 seconds to go. 
Nothing could possibly have happened after this, right?
Congratulations to Dak Prescott for again outplaying Aaron Rodgers, again holding off Romo and again performing like a clutch MVP.
â€” Skip Bayless (@RealSkipBayless) January 16, 2017 

Meanwhile, young Sixers superstar Joel Embiid is a Packers fan, as it turns out. He was tweeting his support for Green Bay throughout the game.
Aaron Rodgers is the GOAT #GoPackGo 
â€” Joel Embiid (@JoelEmbiid) January 15, 2017 


Referees are the only thing that can stop us ðŸ¤”ðŸ¤”
â€” Joel Embiid (@JoelEmbiid) January 15, 2017 

As he is perhaps the pro athlete who is currently the best at Twitter , Embiid is uniquely qualified to clap back at Bayless, and he took the bait from Skip like we all hoped he would. 
Well he's going homeâ€¦â€¦.. https://t.co/DPybmM9Lak 
â€” Joel Embiid (@JoelEmbiid) January 16, 2017 

As far as trash talk goes, this oneâ€™s pretty tame from The Process. Itâ€™s almost a shame, because responding to a troll like Bayless gives him more attention, and thus more power. Any shot taken at Skip has got to be vicious to make it worth it. But weâ€™re still entertained by most anything Embiid does, so who are we to judge? Now weâ€™re secretly hoping Skip invites Embiid onto his Fox Sports 1 show. Thatâ€™d be something thatâ€™d get us to watch.
